history.proof: intros A T r f x n H1 H2 H3 H4. apply chain_ind. - intros x' H. apply chain_single. - intros x' y H5 H6 H7. apply chain_concat_s. apply H7. - intros x' y z H5 H6 H7 H8 H9. apply chain_concat_m. + sfirstorder depth: 3. + sfirstorder depth: 3. - srun best use: iteres_dom_ok, pre_domok_incr_chain, iteres_incr.

ctx: intros A T r f x n H1 H2 H3 H4.
intros A T r f x n H1 H2 H3 H4.
exceptions.exn: No such goal. Focus next goal with bullet -.

ctx: intros A T r f x n H1 H2 H3 H4.
exceptions.tactic: intros x y H5 H6 H7.

ctx: intros A T r f x n H1 H2 H3 H4.
intros x' y H5 H6 H7.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set T : mEnsemble A r : mRelation A f : Map A -> Map A x : Map A n : nat H1 : T x H2 : def_ok_app A T f H3 : increasing_app A r f H4 : r x (f x) x', y : Map A H5 : mEnsemble A H6 : mRelation A H7 : H5 x' Unable to unify "mEnsemble A" with "H5 x'".

ctx: intros A T r f x n H1 H2 H3 H4.
intros x' y H5 H6 H7.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set T : mEnsemble A r : mRelation A f : Map A -> Map A x : Map A n : nat H1 : T x H2 : def_ok_app A T f H3 : increasing_app A r f H4 : r x (f x) x', y : Map A H5 : mEnsemble A H6 : mRelation A H7 : H5 x' Unable to unify "mRelation A" with "H5 x'".

ctx: intros A T r f x n H1 H2 H3 H4.
intros x' y H5 H6 H7.
exceptions.tactic: intros x y z H5 H6 H7 H8 H9.

ctx: intros A T r f x n H1 H2 H3 H4.
intros x' y H5 H6 H7.
intros x' y z H5 H6 H7 H8 H9.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set T : mEnsemble A r : mRelation A f : Map A -> Map A x : Map A n : nat H1 : T x H2 : def_ok_app A T f H3 : increasing_app A r f H4 : r x (f x) x', y : Map A z : prechain A H5 : mEnsemble A H6 : mRelation A H7 : H5 y H8 : H6 x' y H9 : chain A H5 H6 (concat A z x') Unable to unify "mEnsemble A" with "H5 y".

ctx: intros A T r f x n H1 H2 H3 H4.
intros x' y H5 H6 H7.
intros x' y z H5 H6 H7 H8 H9.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: intros A T r f x n H1 H2 H3 H4.
intros x' y H5 H6 H7.
intros x' y z H5 H6 H7 H8 H9.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set T : mEnsemble A r : mRelation A f : Map A -> Map A x : Map A n : nat H1 : T x H2 : def_ok_app A T f H3 : increasing_app A r f H4 : r x (f x) x', y : Map A z : prechain A H5 : mEnsemble A H6 : mRelation A H7 : H5 y H8 : H6 x' y H9 : chain A H5 H6 (concat A z x') Unable to unify "mRelation A" with "H6 x' y".

ctx: intros A T r f x n H1 H2 H3 H4.
intros x' y H5 H6 H7.
intros x' y z H5 H6 H7 H8 H9.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: intros A T r f x n H1 H2 H3 H4.
intros x' y H5 H6 H7.
intros x' y z H5 H6 H7 H8 H9.
intros A T r f x n H1 H2 H3 H4.
intros x' y H5 H6 H7.
intros x' y z H5 H6 H7 H8 H9.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros A T r f x n H1 H2 H3 H4.
intros x' y H5 H6 H7.
intros x' y z H5 H6 H7 H8 H9.

original: intros A T r f x n H1 H2 H3 H4. apply chain_ind. - intros x H. apply chain_single. apply H. - intros x y H5 H6 H7. apply chain_concat_s. + apply H5. + apply H6. + apply H7. - intros x y z H5 H6 H7 H8 H9. apply chain_concat_m. + apply H5. + apply H6. + apply H8. + apply H9. - apply H1.
